page.title: 04POINTINGS AND FINNIGANS
page.content:
POINTINGS Pointings is at Low Prudhoe. They have 50 men working there making food colouring and flavouring. Products are sold all over the world. Dyes are mixed in 2000 vessels using two and a half tons of salt in each batch made. They make flavourings for Crisps, Sweets, Soft Drinks and other products.
FINNIGANS Finnigans employs 56 workers 12 of them women. It has been a paintworks for 8 years. It packs 60 tins of paint a minute. Raw materials they use are: Resin, White Spirit, Chloro_ethylene dioxide and various dyes. The factory is the only one in the U.K. It makes Waxoyl, dyes, wax and glue.
